title: I'm Calling the Cops
itunes:title: I'm Calling the Cops
description:
Today on the show, west coast rapper/ actor/ entrepreneur Ice Cube stopped by and spoke to us about the update on the "Big 3" and more. Also, after Angela spoke about a white woman stealing a grassed dog outside her friends bakery, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would call the cops. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to man who used the phrase "paying your respects" to someone who has passed, in a whole different manner. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show, west coast rapper/ actor/ entrepreneur Ice Cube stopped by and spoke to us about the update on the "Big 3" and more. Also, after Angela spoke about a white woman stealing a grassed dog outside her friends bakery, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would call the cops. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to man who used the phrase "paying your respects" to someone who has passed, in a whole different manner. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
